page.title: 16A SHOPKEEPER'S DAY
page.content: Q. What time do you start work? A. About 6.30 am and finish at 5.30 pm Q. How long do you have for dinner? A. 1.5 hours to 2 hours. Q. How long have you been working in the shop? A. Fourteen years. Q. What does your work include? A. Packing, marking papers, stock taking and ordering. Q. What qualifications do you need? A. Just common sense really. Q. If there was something you would most like to see in Stopsley, what would it be? A. More houses and people. Q. Why? A. Better business really. Q. Has Stopsley changed? A. Yeah, quite a bit, its grown towards the airport now. Q. How many people work for you? A. At the moment, three.
